name: Minesweeper but FPS
description:
Every single minesweeper game that I saw simply reproduce the same old grid from the original game, and none allows you to explore an actual minefield in a 3D environment...

So I made one that does.

A simple short game to test out a new idea, and showcase the different gameplays that could emerge from it.

Features :

- Explosions

- Different types of detectors to avoid mines

- 11 levels

- More explosions

- Probably other stuff in the future
